Staffjoy | https://www.staffjoy.com | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE

Staffjoy helps businesses to create and share schedules with hourly workers. We were apart of the first Y Combinator Fellowship class last Fall, and now we are a 6-person team based in Fisherman's Wharf.

Our tech stack is primarily Go and React/Flux. We run a pure microservice architecture on Kubernetes and heavily rely on tools like Protobuf, gRPC, and the Bazel build system. We ship quickly and often - we just redid our website, and are in limited availability with a V2 rewrite of our application!

We're currently hiring:

* Dev-ops Engineer * Front-End Engineering Lead

Learn more and apply at: https://www.staffjoy.com/careers/
